entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13 with temperature rising to minus 10 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening then partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13 with temperature rising to minus 10 by morning. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 14 in the afternoon. POP 30%
